attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As a driver who is out on the road a lot I feel that much the same as mobile phones a cigarette held in the hand while driving constitutes a real hazard.

i remember my father smoking while driving and then taking both hands off the wheel when burning ash dropped into his lap.

I therefore think that along with mobile phones and eating smoking in cars while driving should be banned.

Another difficult one to enforce however.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
